test.instr: (:ins (:info (inside X Y) (:cond (sort X bottle) (color X black) (sort Y microwave))) (:task (pickup X) (:cond (sort X bottle) (color X white))) (:task (putin X Y) (:cond (sort X can) (sort Y microwave))) (:task (puton X Y) (:cond (sort X remotecontrol) (color X black) (sort Y cupboard))) (:task (goto X) (:cond (sort X desk))) (:task (close X) (:cond (sort X microwave))) (:task (pickup X) (:cond (sort X bottle) (color X black))) (:cons_not (:task (goto X) (:cond (sort X worktable)))) (:cons_not (:task (takeout X Y) (:cond (sort X can) (color X red) (sort Y microwave)))) )
test.nl: There is a black bottle in the microwave. Pick up the white bottle. Put a can in the microwave. Put the black remotecontrol on the cupboard. Go to the desk. Close the microwave. Pick up the black bottle. Do not go to the worktable. Do not take out the red can from the microwave.
